original_text: Of the sons of Naphtali after their families: of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites: of Guni, the family of the Gunites:
korean_text: 납달리 자손은 그들의 종족대로 이러하니 야셀에게서 난 야셀 종족과 구니에게서 난 구니 종족과

sentences.original_text: Of the sons of Naphtali after their families:
of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites:
of Guni, the family of the Gunites:
